scripts.config-1: dotenv cross-var pulumi config set service_instance_count %PULUMI_INSTANCE_COUNT%
scripts.config-2: dotenv cross-var pulumi config set service_instance_size '%PULUMI_INSTANCE_SIZE%'
scripts.config-3: dotenv cross-var pulumi config set service_db_count %PULUMI_DB_COUNT%
scripts.config-4: dotenv cross-var pulumi config set service_db_engine '%PULUMI_DB_ENGINE%'
scripts.config-5: dotenv cross-var pulumi config set service_db_version '%PULUMI_DB_VERSION%'
scripts.config-6: dotenv cross-var pulumi config set repo '%PULUMI_REPO_NAME%'
scripts.config-7: dotenv cross-var pulumi config set branch '%PULUMI_REPO_BRANCH%'
scripts.config-8: dotenv cross-var pulumi config set services_name '%PULUMI_SERVICES_NAME%'
scripts.config-9: dotenv cross-var echo export DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN=%DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN% && echo $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN
scripts.configs: npm run config-1 && npm run config-2 && npm run config-3 && npm run config-4 && npm run config-5 && npm run config-6 && npm run config-7 && npm run config-8 && npm run config-9
scripts.live: npm run configs && pulumi refresh && pulumi up
